My QDK won't open properly

I open it as normal, it displays the Tip of the Day, the usual button thing appears in the taskbar, but nothing appears onscreen?  Is this a bug?

I am currently working on a game and I have had to put it on hold because of this.

Alex, is there a reason for this?  i was only about 8 days into the trial when it started happening.

I am using Windows 98 and QDK normal.

Matthew G.

Posts.EditableText:
Right click on the "button" in the task bar. Click on "move" that comes up in the menu.

I'm not sure if you can move the mouse or press the up/down/left/right arrow keys to move the window.
I think the window may be off the screen (as happens quite often with some programs).
Posts.HTML:
Right click on the "button" in the task bar. Click on "move" that comes up in the menu.

I'm not sure if you can move the mouse or press the up/down/left/right arrow keys to move the window.
I think the window may be off the screen (as happens quite often with some programs).
